name: Maxwell The Cat - NES adventure
description:
Help Maxwell the cat save his friend, while avoiding doge and collecting cookies and cart-wheels.

Short and unlicensed homebrew game for Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) made over one weekend by Sonja and Sophie via NESmaker 4.5.9 and photo editing tools.

Tested with Mesen emulator: https://mesen.ca/

Game is in NTSC 60Hz format.

MAXWELL FOREVER! xoxo
